title: Did the national football owner order his players to stand during the national anthem?
subtitle: The owner of the National Football Association did not tell his players that they were "activists" playing "Super National Champions," so they had to stand up while playing the American National Anthem.
author: Dan Evon
vclaim: One of the national football owners told his players that they were "activists" playing "Super National Champions," so they had to stand up while playing the American National Anthem.
